name: 丁秀儀
objective:
商業關注的財務問題的分析，在案例素材中展現出來。考慮資本需求的決定，替代資本投資之間的選擇，融資資本支出的規劃方法；規劃資本重組、兼併和改組。
Analysis of financial problems of business concerns, presented in case materials. Considers determination of capital needs, choosing among alternative capital investments, planning methods of financing new capital expenditures, and planning recapitalizations, mergers, and reorganizations.
schedule:
1-Introduction
2-Financial Valuation Discounting
3-Net Present Value and Other Investment Rules 
4-Net Present Value and Other Investment Rules
materials: Read the cases and answer the question at the end of each case before the class.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG10：減少不平等（Reduced Inequalities）

name: 吳牧恩
objective:
本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。再者，本課程以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構。將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. Furthermore, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. It can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.
scorePolicy:
出席 30%
作業 30%
上課討論 40%
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG2：消除飢餓（Zero Hunger）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）

name: 陳育威
objective: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生金融科技的基本概念與應用，以及創新思考的方法，使學生能夠創造物聯網方面的創新應用。課程內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、第三方交易、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈技術、跨境電子商務、程式交易、機器人理財等。
schedule:
第一週   加密貨幣 (一)
第二週   加密貨幣 (二)
第三週   真實資產代幣化 (RWA)
scorePolicy: 作業、平時課堂討論、期末報告
materials:
1. FinTech 金融科技革命，作者：曹磊、錢海利
2. Blockchain，作者：Melanie Swan，出版商：O’REILLY
